page.title: 05Hutton Garage & Petrol Stn.
page.content: The garage is on the main road from Billericay to Shenfield.They are agents for{Austin Rover,} British company.The cheapest car is the {Mini {City E}price Â£3387.95, the most expensive the{Rover 3500cc}price Â£15,989.03. The most popular car they sell is the{Austin Metro}price Â£3974. The petrol sold is {Esso}- price per gallon Â£1.996, and diesel fuel.Approximately 4,500 litres or 1000 gallons of petrol are sold a week.Friday is the busiest day for fuel sales. 22 men work at the garage which sells cars,and spare parts, and does{ {Ministry of Transport Tests.}The garage does between 10 to 15{M.O.T {Tests}a week and sell about 300 cars a year.
